mapper.insert: insert into product (prodNum, prodName, categoryNum, price, img1, img2, img3, prodInfo, stock) values(prod_seq.nextval, #{prodName}, #{categoryNum}, #{price}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{prodInfo}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update product set prodName = #{prodName}, categoryNum = #{categoryNum}, price = #{price}, img1 = #{img1}, img2 = #{img2}, img3 = #{img3}, prodInfo = #{prodInfo}, stock = #{stock} where prodNum = #{prodNum}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from product
where prodNum > 0
